bill.title: Affirmative Consent; University of Hawaii; Task Force
bill.description: Establishes an affirmative consent task force to review and make recommendations on the University of Hawaii's executive policy on domestic violence, dating violence, sexual assault, and stalking. (CD1)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to HEA/JDL, WAM.
The committee(s) on HEA/JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 02-05-15 1:30PM in conference room 224.

The committee(s) on HEA recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in HEA were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Taniguchi, Inouye, Gabbard, Kahele; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Kidani, Wakai.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Keith-Agaran, Shimabukuro, Gabbard, Ihara, L. Thielen; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Espero.
Reported from HEA/JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 425) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-25-15 9:00AM in conference room 211.
The committee(s) on WAM deferred the measure until 02-27-15 1:15PM in conference room 211.
The committee(s) on WAM deferred the measure until 03-03-15 1:15PM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 9 Aye(s): Senator(s) Tokuda, Kouchi, Dela Cruz, English, Galuteria, Harimoto, Inouye, Riviere, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Chun Oakland, Ruderman.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 801) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-10-15.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Shimabukuro). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 125) in amended form (SD 2).
Pass First Reading
Referred to HED, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 30
Bill scheduled to be heard by HED on Tuesday, 03-17-15 2:00PM in House conference room 309.

The committees on HED recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Choy, Ichiyama, Ing, Ito, Kong, LoPresti, Ohno, Takumi, Tsuji; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Aquino, Say, Matsumoto, Tupola.
Reported from HED (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 983) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Kawakami, LoPresti, Luke, Saiki excused (4).
Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Tuesday, 03-24-15 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 11 Ayes: Representative(s) Rhoads, San Buenaventura, Brower, Creagan, Hashem, C. Lee, Morikawa, Nakashima, Takayama, McDermott, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Belatti, Kawakami, Woodson.
Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1183) as amended in HD 2, recommending referral to FIN.
Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on FIN as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Choy, Ing, Lowen, Luke, McKelvey, Pouha excused (6).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Wednesday, 04-08-15 3:00PM in House conference room 308.
Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 14 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Nishimoto, Cachola, Cullen, DeCoite, Johanson, Jordan, Keohokalole, Kobayashi, Lowen, Onishi, Yamashita, Pouha, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Tokioka.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1628) as amended in HD 3, recommending passage on Third Reading.
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 04-14-15.
Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 3 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 511).
Senate disagrees with House amendments.
Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 638).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Taniguchi Chair; Shimabukuro, English Co-Chairs; L. Thielen, Slom.
House Conferees Appointed: Ichiyama, San Buenaventura, Tokioka Co-Chairs; Morikawa, Matsumoto.

Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 624).

Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-27-15 1:00PM in conference room 329.
Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-30-15 1:00PM in conference room 329.
Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 05-01-15 11:00AM in conference room 329.

The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Taniguchi, Shimabukuro, English, L. Thielen; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Slom.

The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 4 Ayes: Representative(s) Ichiyama, San Buenaventura, Morikawa, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Tokioka.
Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 89).
48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 05-05-15.
Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 89) as amended in (CD 1).
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 05-05-15.
Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). 25 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 0 Excused: none.
Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0).

Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 680).
Enrolled to Governor.
